mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Edwards, William to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Edwards, William
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Aug 15 1861. By Telegraph from Zanesville 15 1861. Will I need the assistance of another good man can I draw on you for fifty 50 to a hundred 100 to fit out have not received pay for services heretofore answer. Wm Edwards 30w75col
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Edwards, William
Zanesville, Ohio
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
